rules.rule: Vessel must maintain current DP Operations Manual (DPOM) onboard
rules.action: Verificar atualização e disponibilidade do DPOM na ponte

rules.rule: FMEA analysis must be conducted annually and after major system changes
rules.action: Agendar FMEA anual e validar análise de modos de falha

rules.rule: Annual DP trials must be conducted with documented results
rules.action: Executar DP trials e documentar capability plots

rules.rule: At least three independent position reference systems required for DP2/DP3
rules.action: Verificar redundância de sensores de posição e calibração

rules.rule: Thruster configuration must maintain position after single failure
rules.action: Testar capacidade de manter posição com falha de propulsor

rules.rule: Power management system must prevent blackout scenarios
rules.action: Validar sistema de gerenciamento de carga e redundância elétrica

rules.rule: Qualified DPO must be present during DP operations
rules.action: Confirmar presença e certificação do DPO durante operação DP

rules.rule: Operations must remain within documented capability envelope
rules.action: Verificar condições ambientais contra capability plots

rules.rule: All DP incidents must be reported and analyzed
rules.action: Registrar incidente no sistema SGSO e notificar autoridade competente

rules.rule: DP system software updates require validation and testing
rules.action: Validar atualização de software e executar testes funcionais
